front.title: MIME Types for Use with the ISO ILL Protocol

abstract.t: This memorandum describes a set of MIME types for use with the ISO Interlibrary Loan Protocol (,).Two MIME types are specified below.

The first is a media type to carry objects which areBERencoded ISO ILL Protocol Data Units (PDU's).BER are the basic Encoding Rules used to encode PDU's which have been described usingASN.1(Abstract Syntax Notation 1).

The second is for use with the associated document delivery instructions. Document Delivery Instructions (DDI) is an emerging protocol which enables automatic electronic delivery of items. It allows a request management system (which might have received a request for an item via the ISO Interlibrary Loan Protocol (,) to pass details of the request, item, and delivery, to a delivery module, and to receive back reports on the delivery process or arrival of an item. It is currently being submitted to the ISO TC46/SC4/WG4 committee for approval as an ISO standard.
